商品名稱: 女款 波西米亞風 花卉 T 恤 復古花卉圖案 T 恤 植物學 T 恤 野花 襯衫 花園愛好者上衣
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: Dark Blue
留言內容: This is a pretty t-shirt.  The t-shirt is well-made with good stitching (no wonky seams or loose threads).  The material is soft which makes the t-shirt comfortable to wear.  I ordered an XX-Large which is slightly big (I am 5’ 7”, 130ishpounds, 36D).  I wanted to make sure it would fit would my chest (I need 44”) and it does (with a couple of inches to spare).  The flowers are well-done.  They look so delicate.  The flowers really pop on the blue.  I like the cuffed sleeves (gives the t-shirt a feminine look).  It washes up beautifully (comes out soft and without wrinkles).  This is a lovely t-shirt.
